attributes.action: regulate and make banks work for the customer not themselfs
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: 99% of us in the uk have no choice about having to use a bank, our salarys have to be paid in. but banks are able to dictate just how we use our money and what services we can have. they dictate the amounts we can withdraw, decide if we can have a debit card or do we have to risk using cash machines and asault at the same time on withdrawl from thieves!this is our money hard earned and we  should be in charge of it not the banks! many people in the uk only qualify for a cash card why its our money? if is in we use it if its not we cant with a debit card, what happened to freedom and choice? regardless of financial standing.
